record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 1348 AND H.R. 2080

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are two bills at the desk, and I ask for their first reading, en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for a second reading en bloc, and I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
